title: Corvit Administrator Toolkit 0.79
description:
[b]Corvit Administrator Toolkit 0.79[/b]

Corvit Administrator Toolkit is based on Hiren's BootCD 15.2, which further includes some components and tools from DLC.Boot.2015.2.0.Build.150125.iso and Ultimate.DLCD.Boot.2015.v1.0.iso.

In addition to these components and tools which are listed below some older utilities are removed only from Grub4Dos menu.lst, while they are remained available in Dos Programs Hiren 2012 as well as their newer versions and additional utilities in Dos Programs DLCD 2014.

[b]MAIN MENU aka Grub4Dos[/b]

[b]Acronis Backup 11.5[/b] (Business version supporting Universal Restore, Full Image Backups, Incremental Backups etc)
[b]Acronis Disk Director 11[/b] Advance (Business version supporting Disk Partitioning, Disk Editing, Raid Partitioning etc) 
[b]Norton Ghost 11.5.1[/b] (Corporate edition supporting USB, SCSI, Network Backup and Restore etc)
[b]Partition Wizard Professional Edition 8.1.1[/b] (Professional edition supporting Disk Managing, Disk Conversion, Partition Merging and Spliting etc)

[b]Passware Windows Key Enterprise Edition 12.5[/b] (Enterprse edition supporting Administrator and Local account passwords reseting and backup)
[b]Piotr Bania Kon-Boot 2.4[/b] (Comercial license supporting Windows authentication process bypass without overwriting old password)
[b]Plop Boot Manager 5.0.15[/b] (Open source supporting OS boot from USb, CD/DVD and hard disk without BIOS support)
[b]Kaspersky Rescue Disk 10[/b] (Freeware edition supporting scaning and disinfecting x86 and x64 compatible computers)

[b]Dos Programs Hiren 2012[/b] (Old) (Hirens Dos programs from 15.2)
[b]Dos Programs DLCD 2014[/b] (New) (DLCD Dos programs from 1.0)
[b]Boot To Windows XP[/b] (Live Windows)
[b]Boot From Hard Disk[/b] (Local Windows)
